code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney for more than 5 weeks. he is a male government agent aged 62 years. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 177 cm, Weight 64.7 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.
